modules.name: arrow
build-commands: export ARROW_ABSL_URL=/run/build/arrow/absl-20211102.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_AUTH_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-auth-v0.6.22.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_CAL_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-cal-v0.5.20.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_COMMON_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-common-v0.8.9.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_COMPRESSION_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-compression-v0.2.16.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_EVENT_STREAM_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-event-stream-v0.2.18.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_HTTP_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-http-v0.7.3.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_IO_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-io-v0.13.14.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_MQTT_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-mqtt-v0.8.4.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_S3_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-s3-v0.2.3.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_C_SDKUTILS_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-c-sdkutils-v0.1.6.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_CHECKSUMS_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-checksums-v0.1.13.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_CRT_CPP_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-crt-cpp-v0.18.16.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWS_LC_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-lc-v1.3.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_AWSSDK_URL=/run/build/arrow/aws-sdk-cpp-1.10.55.tar.gz && export ARROW_AZURE_SDK_URL=/run/build/arrow/azure-identity_1.9.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_BOOST_URL=/run/build/arrow/boost-1_81_0.tar.gz && export ARROW_BROTLI_URL=/run/build/arrow/brotli-v1.0.9.tar.gz && export ARROW_BZIP2_URL=/run/build/arrow/bzip2-1.0.8.tar.gz && export ARROW_CARES_URL=/run/build/arrow/cares-1.17.2.tar.gz && export ARROW_CRC32C_URL=/run/build/arrow/crc32c-1.1.2.tar.gz && export ARROW_GBENCHMARK_URL=/run/build/arrow/gbenchmark-v1.8.3.tar.gz && export ARROW_GFLAGS_URL=/run/build/arrow/gflags-v2.2.2.tar.gz && export ARROW_GLOG_URL=/run/build/arrow/glog-v0.5.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_GOOGLE_CLOUD_CPP_URL=/run/build/arrow/google-cloud-cpp-v2.22.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_GRPC_URL=/run/build/arrow/grpc-v1.46.3.tar.gz && export ARROW_GTEST_URL=/run/build/arrow/gtest-1.11.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_JEMALLOC_URL=/run/build/arrow/jemalloc-5.3.0.tar.bz2 && export ARROW_LZ4_URL=/run/build/arrow/lz4-1.10.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_MIMALLOC_URL=/run/build/arrow/mimalloc-v2.0.6.tar.gz && export ARROW_NLOHMANN_JSON_URL=/run/build/arrow/nlohmann-json-v3.10.5.tar.gz && export ARROW_OPENTELEMETRY_URL=/run/build/arrow/opentelemetry-cpp-v1.13.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_OPENTELEMETRY_PROTO_URL=/run/build/arrow/opentelemetry-proto-v0.17.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_ORC_URL=/run/build/arrow/orc-2.1.1.tar.gz && export ARROW_PROTOBUF_URL=/run/build/arrow/protobuf-21.3.tar.gz && export ARROW_RAPIDJSON_URL=/run/build/arrow/rapidjson-232389d4f1012dddec4ef84861face2d2ba85709.tar.gz && export ARROW_RE2_URL=/run/build/arrow/re2-2022-06-01.tar.gz && export ARROW_S2N_TLS_URL=/run/build/arrow/s2n-v1.3.35.tar.gz && export ARROW_SNAPPY_URL=/run/build/arrow/snappy-1.1.10.tar.gz && export ARROW_SUBSTRAIT_URL=/run/build/arrow/substrait_v0.44.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_THRIFT_URL=/run/build/arrow/thrift-0.20.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_UCX_URL=/run/build/arrow/ucx-1.12.1.tar.gz && export ARROW_UTF8PROC_URL=/run/build/arrow/utf8proc-v2.7.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_XSIMD_URL=/run/build/arrow/xsimd-13.0.0.tar.gz && export ARROW_ZLIB_URL=/run/build/arrow/zlib-1.3.1.tar.gz && export ARROW_ZSTD_URL=/run/build/arrow/zstd-1.5.7.tar.gz && cmake -GNinja --preset ninja-release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/app -DCMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=/app/lib && cmake --build . && ninja && ninja install

---x-checker-data.comment: commented because numpy 2.0 wants a newer python
---x-checker-data.name: numpy

modules.name: expat
modules.comment: This is on the FDO runtime, we need to bring it to work around https://github.com/libexpat/libexpat/issues/501

modules.name: qscintilla
build-commands: cd src/ && QMAKEFEATURES=$PWD/src/features/ qmake && qmake -set prefix /app && make -j ${FLATPAK_BUILDER_N_JOBS:-`nproc`} && PREFIX=/app DESTDIR=/banana make install

cd Python && mv pyproject{-qt5,}.toml && sip-build --no-make --qsci-features-dir ../src/features --qsci-include-dir ../src --qsci-library-dir ../src --api-dir /app/share/qt/qsci/api/python --target-dir=/app/lib/python3.12/site-packages && make -C build -j ${FLATPAK_BUILDER_N_JOBS:-`nproc`} && make -C build install
